author: European Commission
title: European Union Industry Confidence
text:
European Union Industry Confidence
Summary
Forecast
Download
Business Confidence in European Union decreased to -9 points in October from -8.80 points in September of 2023. Business Confidence in European Union averaged -4.75 points from 1985 until 2023, reaching an all time high of 12.80 points in October of 2021 and a record low of -36.40 points in April of 2020.
source:
European Commission
Business Confidence in European Union decreased to -9 points in October from -8.80 points in September of 2023.
Business Confidence in European Union decreased to -9 points in October from -8.80 points in September of 2023. Business Confidence in European Union is expected to be -2.00 points by the end of this quarter, according to Trading Economics global macro models and analysts expectations. In the long-term, the European Union Industry Confidence is projected to trend around 1.50 points in 2024 and 0.60 points in 2025, according to our econometric models.
